image_prompt: A hyper-realistic, professional wide shot of a modern Australian manufacturing facility interior. In the foreground, a diverse group of reliability engineers (men and women) wearing high-visibility vests, hard hats, and safety glasses are inspecting a large industrial electric motor. One engineer is holding a generic tablet (back of device visible only) pointing toward a wireless sensor mounted on the motor. The background shows a clean, busy production line with conveyors and automated machinery. The lighting is bright and industrial. No text or words should be visible in the image. The atmosphere conveys technology, safety, and efficiency.
